name: Brick Breaker (itch) (Pyreling)
description:
A breakout-style game with lots of balls. 

After working through a fantastic tutorial by FriendlyCosmonaut, I decided to  continue working on the project to make it a more complete game. 

GML Tutorial

The game is currently playable with 7 levels, with plans to create more. 

There are likely some bugs and issues I haven't run into in my own testing, so let me know if you find any in the comments!
